title: Review: $220 EVOC Trail Pro MTB pack goes PLUS on back protection, low on weight
content:
EVOC have today released their new line of Trail Pro back protector backpacks for mountain biking, available in 10L, 16L and 26L capacities with two back length options. The new range of packs features EVOC’s new Liteshield PLUS spine protection technology, now wider and more flexible than those that came before it, boasting impact absorption […]

The post Review: $220 EVOC Trail Pro MTB pack goes PLUS on back protection, low on weight appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
